nio/Stagger.description: Split a list of signals and emit the pieces evenly over the configured period.

min_interval.title: Minimum Interval
min_interval.description: If the number of signals and the *Period* would cause signals to emit more often than this time period, then group signals into lists so that signals are emitted this often.

period.title: Period
period.description: Time period to spread out the incoming signals.

default.description: Signals split and emitted over the *Period*.
